content.text: Doing well too, thanks. What is your favorite season?
I love fall because the weather is perfect and the leaves change colors.
Same! And I love wearing jackets and scarves. What is your favorite show?
I love Tom and Jerry. It is so funny.
I love it too! It was my favorite show growing up. What is your favorite color?
Pink is my favorite color. It is so pretty.
I love pink too! It is my favorite color for nail polish. What do you do for fun?
I like to watch movies and play video games. What do you like to do?
I like to go hiking and kayaking. I also like to read.
Hiking sounds like fun. I have never tried kayaking. I like to read too.
It is a lot of fun! I like to go kayaking on the lake.
I would love to try it sometime.
You should! It is really fun.
